headline: A Look At Valero Energy (VLO) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum And Mixed Signals
summary: Valero Energy stock context Valero Energy (VLO) has drawn attention after its recent trading around $197.39, with returns over the past month and past 3 months contrasting with softer daily and weekly moves. The recent 1 day and 7 day share price declines sit against a stronger trend, with a 30 day share price return of 5.51%, a 90 day gain of 13.38% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 50.45%.
